wikipedia_page.main: Jake Harders is an English actor.

response: English playwright Jemma Kennedy adapted the story into a musical drama which was performed at the Unicorn Theatre in London 2012–2013, directed by Selina Cartmell and starring twins Danielle Bird and Nichole Bird as the Prince and Pauper and Jake Harders as Miles Hendon.
*Jake Harders, for Reverend Alexander Mill in Candida (Oxford Stage Company)
